Question
========

The following cross tabulation includes data from 100 individuals for two variables A and B. We randomly draw someone from among the 100 individuals.

  ------- ------- ------- ------- A = 1 A = 2 A = 3 B = 1 19 20 23 B = 2 18 2 18 ------- ------- ------- -------

For this person, P(B = 1 | A = 2) is equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 0.09
* 0.2
* 0.54
* 0.91

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.09: Incorrect
* 0.2: Incorrect
* 0.54: Incorrect
* 0.91: Correct
